name: wildwords-app
description: Wild Words - A demo app showcasing best practices with React, Apollo, and Knex

scripts.build: pnpm run build:backend && pnpm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd client && pnpm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd server && pnpm install && cd ../client && pnpm install
scripts.cap:android: cd client && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:ios: cd client && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:build: cd client && pnpm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:run:android: cd client && npx cap run android
scripts.cap:run:ios: cd client && npx cap run ios

author: Demo App
